languages.text: {n}Махарий кладет руку на меч, бросает полный сомнения взгляд на изображения {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, взирающие на него отовсюду, затем — на вас. Пальцы отпускают эфес.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Махарий кладет руку на меч, бросает полный сомнения взгляд на изображения Императора, взирающие на него отовсюду, затем — на вас. Пальцы отпускают эфес.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius places his hand on the hilt of his sword, then glances with uncertainty at the images of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} gazing upon him from every direction, then at you. His fingers release the hilt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Махарий кладет руку на меч, бросает полный сомнения взгляд на изображения {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, взирающие на него отовсюду, затем — на вас. Пальцы отпускают эфес.{/n}

{n}Macharius places his hand on the hilt of his sword, then glances with uncertainty at the images of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} gazing upon him from every direction, then at you. His fingers release the hilt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マハリウスは剣の柄に手を置くと、あらゆる方向から彼にじっと視線を送る{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の肖像を不安げに見つめてから、あなたを見る。マハリウスの指が柄から離れていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius places his hand on the hilt of his sword, then glances with uncertainty at the images of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} gazing upon him from every direction, then at you. His fingers release the hilt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスは剣の柄に手を置くと、あらゆる方向から彼にじっと視線を送る{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の肖像を不安げに見つめてから、あなたを見る。マハリウスの指が柄から離れていく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}马卡里乌斯将手搭在剑柄上，随后犹豫地瞥了一眼从四面八方注视着他的{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}画像，又看了看你。随后，他将手从剑柄上拿了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius places his hand on the hilt of his sword, then glances with uncertainty at the images of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} gazing upon him from every direction, then at you. His fingers release the hilt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯将手搭在剑柄上，随后犹豫地瞥了一眼从四面八方注视着他的{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}画像，又看了看你。随后，他将手从剑柄上拿了下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius agarra la empuñadura de su espada, luego mira con incertidumbre las imágenes del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} que lo vislumbran desde todas direcciones y, después, a ti. Sus dedos sueltan la empuñadura.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius places his hand on the hilt of his sword, then glances with uncertainty at the images of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} gazing upon him from every direction, then at you. His fingers release the hilt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius agarra la empuñadura de su espada, luego mira con incertidumbre las imágenes del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} que lo vislumbran desde todas direcciones y, después, a ti. Sus dedos sueltan la empuñadura.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius pose une main sur la garde de son épée, mais semble se raviser après avoir jeté un coup d'œil aux nombreuses représentations de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} dont le regard semble chaque fois fixé sur lui.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius places his hand on the hilt of his sword, then glances with uncertainty at the images of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} gazing upon him from every direction, then at you. His fingers release the hilt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius pose une main sur la garde de son épée, mais semble se raviser après avoir jeté un coup d'œil aux nombreuses représentations de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} dont le regard semble chaque fois fixé sur lui.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius legt seine Hand auf seinen Schwertgriff und blickt dann erst unsicher auf die Bilder des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, die ihn von allen Seiten ansehen, und dann auf dich. Seine Finger lösen sich vom Griff.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius places his hand on the hilt of his sword, then glances with uncertainty at the images of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} gazing upon him from every direction, then at you. His fingers release the hilt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius legt seine Hand auf seinen Schwertgriff und blickt dann erst unsicher auf die Bilder des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, die ihn von allen Seiten ansehen, und dann auf dich. Seine Finger lösen sich vom Griff.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius, elini kılıcının kabzasına götürüyor. Önce {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} ona dört bir yandan gözünü diken suretlerine, sonra da sana bakıyor. Parmaklarını kabzadan çekiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius places his hand on the hilt of his sword, then glances with uncertainty at the images of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} gazing upon him from every direction, then at you. His fingers release the hilt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius, elini kılıcının kabzasına götürüyor. Önce {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un ona dört bir yandan gözünü diken suretlerine, sonra da sana bakıyor. Parmaklarını kabzadan çekiyor.{/n}
